archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.3d: d) audit the external supplier (and the supplier's suppliers), including the frequency and types of audit to be performed or an agreement to alternative assurance processes where an audit is not possible
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
